title: SF-36
author: Laurel Dernbach
description: Questionaire to measure quality of life

1.question: In general, would you say your health is:

2.question: Compared to one year ago, how would you rate your health in general now?

responses.1: Much better now than one year ago
responses.2: Somewhat better now than one year ago
responses.4: Somewhat worse now than one year ago
responses.5: Much worse now than one year ago

3.instructions: The following items are about activities you might do during a typical day. Does your health now limit you in these activities? If so, how much?
3.question: Vigorous activities, such as running, lifting heavy objects, participating in strenuous sports
